translation: What is known as the Unmanifested and the Imperishable, That is said to be the highest goal. Those who reach It do not return (to this Samsara). That is My supreme abode (place or state).
commentary: 8.21 Unmanifest unmanifested? The letter is imperishable? It is thus? said called? Tam That? Ahuá¸¥ (they) say? Paramam the highest? Gatim goal (path)? Yam which? attainable having reached? Not not? nivartante return? That that? Dham abode (place or state)? The highest highest? My My.Commentary Para Brahman is called the Unmanifested because It cannot be perceived by the senses. It is also called the Imperishable. Is it all-pervading?
